title: Calories in Starbucks Banana Loaf
meta_description: Learn calories in Starbucks banana loaf: about 410 kcal per serving, plus carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition details with tweaks.
assumptions: Standard Starbucks Banana Loaf (one serving/slice, ~125g); baked with banana, nuts, and typical ingredients; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and exact recipe; check Starbucks app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Starbucks banana loaf has ~410 kcal, 56g carbs, and 5g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in Starbucks banana loaf?
What are the carbs in Starbucks banana loaf?
faqs.a: About 56g total carbs, including 33g sugars and 2g fiber.

faqs.q: Is Starbucks banana loaf high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 19g total fat per loaf, with 3.5g saturated.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Starbucks banana loaf?
Does Starbucks banana loaf have nuts?
faqs.a: Yes, typically includes walnuts; check for allergies as it adds to calories and fat.
